title: Business Analyst
description:
Job Description: We have a job opening for Business Analyst (BA / QA) in Finance Domain to join our growing team. You will be responsible for eliciting, analyzing and managing client requirements. In addition, you will be required to carry out Testing related tasks as well. We are looking for people who are committed and flexible and who possess the right attitude to be part of an innovative organization. Exposure to Cloud and Big Data technology will be added advantage.

Responsibilities

Business Analyst:

Elicit and understand regulatory reporting requirements from a compliance perspective

Write requirement specifications that are aligned to Use Cases and business scenarios

Define product requirements/roadmap by identifying milestones, phases, and elements

Determine operational objectives by studying business functions, gathering relevant information, evaluating output requirements and formats

Study system capabilities and create process models and workflow diagrams as required

Work closely with development team to resolve their queries regarding requirements

Create user documentation, providing help desk support and train users as and when required

Gather and document requirements for customer projects / implementation and define product configuration or change requests if any

Maintain Product backlog and feature prioritization for product development scrums

Testing

Should be able to estimate Test efforts from requirements

Design Test scenarios, Test cases as per the requirements and execute them

Possess thorough knowledge of Back-end testing using SQL Queries

Should be able to perform data validation testing of the product

Able to upload test results and defects using Test Management Tools

Experience: 3 years of work experience

Candidate Profile

Post Graduate in Banking and/or Finance.

3 years of experience in Financial (preferably banking) domain with exposure to regulatory compliance for US/European market

Proficiency in MS excel. Strong conceptual understanding of data modelling and testing environment

Should be familiar with Use Case documentation

Innovative mindset and meticulous attention to details.
